description:
The World Economic Union, usually abbreviated as the Union, is one of the three major world powers in 2307 Anno Domini. It is comprised of the nations and states of the North and South American continents, Australia, and Japan. It controls the orbital elevator located in South America.
The Union is the developer of the mobile suit SVMS-01 Union Flag.
The military branch of the Union is known as the MSWAD.
name: Sekai Keizai Rengou
